Unite_1.anlami: May I have your name, please? / Can I ask your name? Sure, I am Leyla.

Nice/Pleased/Glad to meet you. Me,too/so am I/same to you.

My hometown, Kırıkkale, is in the Central Anatolia Region.
How olda re you? I am 32.
What is your age? I am at the age of 35.

Unite_2.anlami: Are you married? No, I am not married, I am single/bachelor.

Unite_2.anlami: Fatih’le evli ve iki çocuk annesiyim.
I am divorced, I am a widow.
